captions.text:
You can’t get anywhere 
that speed, turtle

That road is 
longer and tougher

When the wounds 
heal, please leave

I’m serious, 
I’ll let you go then

Don’t hide, 
don’t steal my heart

Lies, 
your slow steps

Words from deep down 
my heart, come to me

A sad turtle who 
has nowhere to

put his heart in 
or nowhere to go

Are you hiding alone 
everyday because you
Have too much pain

My sad story 
where I can’t

Protect you and 
there is no more love

It’s okay if it’s a bit slow
Step by step slowly

When a day passes 
it’ll get better

It’s like a spell 
I put on myself

When I see a turtle 
I feel like it’s me

Tears are 
falling like crazy

New buds will open 
and flowers will bloom

My love of tear 
will hug the seeds

Words from deep down my heart 
Come to me

A sad turtle who 
has nowhere to

put his heart in or 
nowhere to go

Are you hiding alone 
everyday because you
Have too much pain

My sad story 
where I can’t

Protect you and 
there is no more love

It’s okay if it’s a bit slow
Step by step slowly

Walking slowly 
along with you

So that you wouldn’t 
cry any more

you're always be my 
always be my love

A sad turtle who 
has nowhere to

put his heart in 
or nowhere to go
(Please don’t leave me)

Are you hiding alone 
everyday because you
Have too much pain

My sad story
where I can’t

Protect you and 
there is no more love

It’s okay if it’s a bit slow
Step by step slowly
